ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: oh look, the kids are out of school. ... From: B & H T  To: EverQuest@onelist.com  Date: Wednesday, October 27, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
oh look, the kids are out of school.

-----Original Message-----
From: B & H T <thornley@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 2:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


>From: "B & H T" <thornley@...>
>
>YOU IDIOTS!!!!!! AC IS BETTER THAN EQ EVER!!!!
>

>
>> From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
>>
>> yeah in asherons call, I just made new characters sold all the equipment
and
>> got alot of money fast. Its too easy in that game
>>

>> Fabno Licious <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 22 Erudite Enchanter,
Erollisi
>> Marr

ran

to

got

your

dungeons.
>> :)

some
>> of

minute
>> you
